name: elite-status-page-azure-devops-extension
description: Azure DevOps extension package for Elite Status Page

scripts.package: npm run validate && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
scripts.publish: npm run validate && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
scripts.share: npm run validate && tfx extension share --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
